title: Cyclick Drumandbass Kontakt Kits
description:
2x DRUM AND BASS LOOP AND INSTRUMENT KITS



To keep the keyboard layout as standard as possible we have put the bass multisample in the first two octaves (C0-B1) and followed that with drum hits and loops, with each instrument taking up an octave or two each above that. The mapping for the two kits included here are as follows:



Drumandbass170bpmA - 

C0-B1 - Bass multisample - looped until key release

C2-G2 - Drum hits

C3-Bb3 - Loops (drums, bass, instruments) - all looped until key release

C4-C5 - WailSynth multisample



Drumandbass165bpmA - 

C0-B1 - Bass multisample - looped until key release

C2-F#2 - Drum hits

C3-G#3 - Loops (drums, bass, instruments and FX) - all looped until key release

C4-B5 - BuzzSynth multisample

C6-C8 - SweeSynth multisample





All the loops are set to the tempo of the kit.

Uploaded by Breity
Merry X-Mas !
